Description: Painted sycomore fig wood shabti of Neferrenpet with a blue and yellow striped lappet wig, a brown face, folded arms painted red at the back, a blue collar, the legs inscribed with Chapter 6 of The Book Of The Dead in the form of eight rows of incised hieroglyphs that extend around the back.
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Somerset Lowry-Corry, 2nd Earl of Belmore
